page.title: 14Home life in Charnwood 2
page.content: The owner, a lace manufacturer in Nottingham lives in a modern bungalow at{Poulteney Cottage Farm.}The original farm cottage is occupied by daughters and the farm buildings are now stables.They keep 4/5 horses and ride to hounds being host to the{Quorn {Hunt}once a season.Their main interest is horses and the consequent social scene.They own 57 acres of pasture and woodland with grazing for 50 cattle on summer let,5 acres of woodland and 2 acres meadow conservatively managed. Casual help only.Clay Shooting Club. {Bawdon Castle Farm}250 acres owned by a Trust in Herts is farmed by a tenant with family help.They have 90 dairy Friesians and some arable and rent summer grazing but find it hard work to make a living as present subsidies do not help small family farmers.They need more Government help.
